title: Custom Prompt
content: When the data is empty, the icon + text prompt is displayed by default. You can also set the slot v-slot:empty or the render-empty attribute to define the prompt content.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Default Prompt
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Fix Center
content: When is-center-empty is set to true, drag the horizontal scroll bar to keep the empty data prompt so that the final data is displayed in the center of the table width
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.
